text: BRITNEY Spears has been in the limelight for almost thirty years. V MAGAZINE WHO'S THAT GIRL? : Britney's comeback shoots lefts fans scratching their heads In that time, we ’ ve seen her mix up her look in every way imaginable when it comes to hair, makeup and styling.
